column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////My wife and I were in town on our baseball bus tour and wanted to have some authentic Chicago pizza
column2: so taking some advice from the Harry Caray servers
column3: we chose Lou Malnati's. My wife ordered the thin crust.and I the deep dish and the pizzas were heavenly! Each order I'd prepared fresh so it was a 35 minute wait but it was worth it! Delicious Chicago pizza!
